documents.document: Need to learn something quickly ~ Tank hook me up! Dammit The Matrix does not exist...
JIRA should have a US pol themes. Bug => Obama did it, Can't reproduce =>Sad!, Defer =>Make America Great Again!, Assigned =>Drain the swamp
First day of my new schedule. Getting off to a good start other than the rain #Wellington
Oz not closest friends of the Trump USA. Can not see it being any better for NZ. Going to be hard for "allies" to send troops if US asks
I had plans to visit the US with family & attend conferences the next 4yrs there is no way I/we are going there. I'm no fan of chaos
@agentK @blauerpunto and when it does come back it will come out weekly too...
@blauerpunto yep it finished with a big cliff hanger... waiting for it come back... I think march it returns in early march. Happy to talk:)
@blauerpunto the first season? Or is their a new episode out now?
Trump is going to find it is easy to make enemies but it is hard to keep friends. If he doesn't lead others will in the world #powergap
Any moment now expect Trump to say the moon landing was faked and cuts all funding to NASA #scienceisreal
Just got my @theRoostStand #theroostisloose yah!
Wikileaks's has lost any respect... Information thugs with their own self severing agenda.
Sad to hear of @carrieffisher passing today - you will be missed #StarWars
@Ilaeria Adult life - ups and downs #RogueOne https://t.co/JrKH9pchQw
That moment you see a cat in your house and you don't have a cat and you try to play nice... but the cat just wants to get out 🐱
@am2605 how to reaffirm your own point of view... block everyone who disagrees with you 🤣
@belperi @DomPost no idea how they thought that was a good defense #PRfail
@belperi @DomPost "The council was looking for outlets that provided a healthier range of food choices, and Mr Whippy met that criteria" ???
I watch the 6pm news today... it takes forever to get through a few news articles. @radionz is so much more concise and condensed.
So pulled my office back together & found myself missing the tiny MagSafe to MagSafe 2 Converter... it bounce off into the office mess
Last night strong quakes... tonight 140km/hr gusts and earthquakes... tomorrow expect an alien invasion... #Wellington #eqnz
@agentK "megathrust interface" the OO term which have made it cool again.
@agentK will be interesting to hear what the eq scientists has to say about it tomorrow
So many different earthquakes up and down the country - not exactly classic after shocks #eqnz
Ok here but my thoughts go out to those in near to the centre #eqnz
Wow that was a big one #eqnz #Wellington
Looks like someone has their twitter back... professional protesters? Yes all protesters are "paid" when you don't agree with them.
When you hear from a client who had a bad experience outsourcing dev to another country and it has gone bad #headdesk
From a distance I'm looking forward to the new comedy which comes out of the new presidency - Bush was a lot of fun.
USA elected a president who didn't win the popular vote... again & starts off with a high negative views. Not a good start #USElection2016
Voting in the States has begun... soon it will be over #vote2016
Seeing console.log() from adverts in the console... just no! You'd think Google would prevent that rubbish
@Ilaeria binge watch some Netflix - @TheCrownNetflix comes out this week. Oh and watch @Stranger_Things
Trying out @BrainfmApp for some background work music... different but similar to house/electronic music I listen to.
@Ilaeria #NoMistakes ;) #PleaseThinkBeforeYouPrint (as in hand writing) haha :)
Working with pen and paper reminds me you only can do this right once #noUndo #noEdit
@agentK will see you in the zoom meeting in 30 mins then ;)
@tmpst_ yeah I'm going to pass this time
I'm going to miss MagSafe but the idea to limit to one port type/cable is good idea. (yes there is still the 3.5 port) #appleevent
That awkward feeling you get when another person's client asks you where they are... and they have not been here all day. #CRM
When you find yourself testing that a device correctly implements all aspects of W3C standard... #killmenow #fragmentation
That time you want to search a negative number on the Internet... "-" just hits too many false positives...
Why is this build taking so long to run on this mobile VM.... why are my fans going crazy.... oh I have another one running #MorePower
In a change from my usual routine - it is time to but a crappy phone for work.
The local body elections for my ward are heating up with new candidate to the ward dishing the dirt on another #localbodyelections #Hutt16
When touchID does not work on the first try - it's like trying to start an old car... and my finger is the starter motor... work damn you!
@Disney really need to get on to @TronLegacy++ @TronLegacy last night again - great movie
@agentK like the base iPhone price US$499('07) and now iPhone 7 US$649.00 which is an higher than inflation increase(US$579.15) Just curious
@MarcinS that is true
Is it me or new iPhone price increasing over time?
So I could do a big download and hog a shared/communal network or just wait till I'm at my office #BeingAGoodNetworkCitizen
As #netflixtax comes to NZ next month will I change to another NZ streaming provider to save $? No. As @netflix will still be the cheapest.
Nice to have the flexibility to work where you want - today it's a @BizDojo day
@TrevorMallard @ninetonoon this was not "typical case" in the Lower Hutt. Interviewees need to get the facts before labelling a community
@tmpst_ it's time for a drink :) beer o'clock
In the nick of time I grab a coffee for a merge... conflict
I really like @SlackHQ reminders - calendar reminder are just clunky. Slack reminders are like smart notes which work

"Stuff Fibre" as an ISP name just sounds bad
@ChorusNZ consent process is terrible with a lack of common sense & communication.
When the paper process is better than the online process. #FibreConsent
MSSQL Management Studio should have the option to just save a whole session without me needing to save to each query to a file
Seriously MSSQL needs to drop the big binary installer requirement and let devs install add-ons from the net.
@Ilaeria all the players in NZ ;)
Pokemon Go is an innocent fantasy game just waiting for the real world to slap it in the face with the news that their are nefarious people

When your dealing with an intermit problem you really need above average professionals... sucks you can't get them.

Will be interesting to see how the results come in for #Brexit
Some idiot indicate left but went straight over on an intersection. He thought he was in the "right". Bright spark drove on indicating left
